definition: attendant on an airplane, train, boat etc
four horse military chariot (archaic)/four (archaic)/generic term for history books
to ride/to mount/to make use of/to avail oneself of/to take advantage of/to multiply (math.)/Buddhist sect or creed
affair/business/matter/to be engaged in/to attend to/by all means

sentences.english: The stewards had stuck sticky labels on the cargo.
sentences.chinese: 乘務員已經將粘性標籤粘貼在貨物上了。

sentences.english: One stewardess stands at the front cabin door to welcome the Passengers aboard.
sentences.chinese: 一位女乘務員站在機艙門口歡迎乘客登機。

sentences.english: The stewardess kindly brought me a blanket.
sentences.chinese: 女乘務員體貼地給我拿來了毯子。

sentences.english: Qatar Airways provides free transport for cabin crew for all official duties.
sentences.chinese: 卡航爲乘務員的公務提供免費的交通。

sentences.english: The flight attendant asked the passengers to fasten their seat belts.
sentences.chinese: 飛機乘務員讓乘客把安全帶扣好。

sentences.english: Ask the stewardess. She will know the answer.
sentences.chinese: 問女乘務員，她會知道答案。

sentences.english: About an hour later, the conductor began to check tickets.
sentences.chinese: 大約一小時後，乘務員開始查票。

sentences.english: Of course, the woman protests and report these indecent acts to the flight attendant.
sentences.chinese: 顯然，女子抗議，並報告了乘務員的猥褻行爲。

sentences.english: We are all crew. — Marshall McLuhan
Jimmy Doolittle told his crews where they were going only after the carrier was at sea.
sentences.chinese: 吉米在航空母艦開進大海後才告訴乘務員們要去哪裏。

sentences.english: The huge aliens came up to the crew.
sentences.chinese: 巨大的異形向乘務員方向而來。

sentences.english: As a flight attendant,she has been to many countries.
sentences.chinese: 作爲一名空中乘務員，她到過許多國家。

sentences.english: The stewardess has just announced the next stop in English.
sentences.chinese: 乘務員剛剛用英語報站。

sentences.english: This stimulated the steward work harder.
sentences.chinese: 這刺激了乘務員更加努力得工作。

sentences.english: The bus conductor takes up the tickets strictly.
sentences.chinese: 這位公共汽車乘務員收票很嚴格。

sentences.english: If you can not understand it well, ask your neighbors or fight attendants.
sentences.chinese: 如果您有任何疑問請向鄰座旅客或乘務員詢問。

definition: service (on a train, a plane etc)
domestic flight/internal line (air, train, ferry etc)
the rear (tail) of a plane etc
